interpretation:
The brick emoji represents strength, stability, and durability. It suggests that you have the ability to build a strong foundation for yourself and your future. Just like bricks are stacked one on top of the other to create a solid structure, you have the power to create a stable and long-lasting life. This card also reminds you that Rome wasn't built in a day, and success requires patience, hard work, and perseverance. 

When the brick appears in a reading, it may suggest that you need to focus on building a solid base before you can move forward. It may also indicate that you have the power to overcome obstacles and withstand any challenges that come your way. This card is a reminder that you are capable of achieving great things, and that your strength and determination will help you succeed.
